entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
